wolne_lektury API

get_books([book, author, epoch, genre, ...])

Get list of books

get_audiobooks([book, author, epoch, genre, ...])

Get list of audiobooks

get_daisy([book, author, epoch, genre, ...])

Get list of books in DAISY version

get_authors()

Get list of authors

get_epochs()

Get list of epochs

get_genres()

Get list of genres

get_kinds()

Get list of kinds

get_themes()

Get list of themes

get_collections()

Get list of collections

get_texts([book_list, book, author, epoch, ...])

Get texts according to the defined query of passed book list

trim_text(text)

Trim raw text

download(output_dir[, book_list, book, ...])

Download files from wolnelektury.com
